mapper.select: select nc.* from(select n.noticeno as noticeno, n.title as title, concat( substr((REGEXP_REPLACE(n.content, '<[^>]*>', ' ')),1,200), case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(n.content, '<[^>]*>', ' '))> 200 then '...' else '' end) as content, n.writer as writer, to_char(n.wdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as wdate, photono from notice n left outer join (select distinct(noticeno), first_value(photono) over(partition by noticeno order by photono) as photono from noticephoto ) np on n.noticeno = np.noticeno order by n.wdate desc ) nc where rownum between (#{pageNo} - 1) * 15 + 1 and #{pageNo} * 15
select photopath from noticephoto where photono = #{photono}
select noticeno,title,content,writer,to_char(wdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as wdate from notice where noticeno = #{noticeno}
select photono from noticephoto where noticeno = #{noticeno}
select photopath from noticephoto where photono = #{imgNo}
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, wdate = sysdate where noticeno = #{noticeno}
mapper.select: select nr.* from(select noticeno,replyforno, case when length(content) >= 50 then concat( substr(content,1,50), '...') else content end as content, rdate,writer,replyno,memberid from noticereply order by rdate desc) nr where rownum <= 3

select nr.* from(select n.*, np.photono from (select noticeno, case when length(title) >=15 then concat(substr(title,1,15), '...') else title end as title , wdate from notice order by wdate desc) n left outer join (select distinct(noticeno), first_value(photono) over(partition by noticeno order by photono) as photono from noticephoto ) np on n.noticeno = np.noticeno order by wdate desc) nr where rownum <= 3

select ns.* from(select n.noticeno as noticeno, n.title as title, concat (substr((REGEXP_REPLACE(n.content, '<[^>]*>', ' ')),1,200), case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(n.content, '<[^>]*>', ' '))> 200 then '...' else '' end) as content, n.writer as writer, to_char(n.wdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as wdate, photono from notice n left outer join (select distinct(noticeno), first_value(photono) over(partition by noticeno order by photono) as photono from noticephoto ) np on n.noticeno = np.noticeno where n.title like concat ('%', #{search}, '%') order by n.wdate desc) ns where rownum between (#{pageNo} - 1) * 5 + 1 and #{pageNo} * 5
select count(*) from notice where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
select path from noticefile where noticeno = #{noticeno} and fno = #{fno}
select categoryno, categoryname, categoryfor from productcategory order by categoryno
